channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 中国公布下一代航母的新图片
item.description: Chinese state media unveiled new images of China's most advanced aircraft carrier yet, including next generation launch tracks that can catapult a wider range of aircraft from its deck.翻译:中国官方媒体公布了中国迄今为止最先进航母的新图片，其中包括可以从甲板上弹射更多类型飞机的下一代发射轨道。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国官员敦促台湾人民在选举中做出“正确选择”
item.description: A senior Chinese official on Wednesday urged Taiwan's people to make a "correct choice" on the island's upcoming elections, which he described as being about peace and war, prosperity and decline.翻译:周三，一名中国高级官员敦促台湾人民在台湾即将举行的选举中做出“正确选择”，他称这次选举关系到和平与战争、繁荣与衰落。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 亚洲股市延续全球抛售，美元保持上涨
item.description: Asian shares extended a global sell-off on Wednesday while the dollar held gains as market optimism about early and aggressive U.S. interest rate cuts ebbed ahead of the release of Fed minutes and jobs data.翻译:亚洲股市周三延续全球抛售，而美元则保持上涨，因市场对美国提前大幅降息的乐观情绪在美联储会议纪要和就业数据公布前消退。
item.author: Stella Qiu

item.title: 风险反弹暂停，美元小幅走高
item.description: The dollar rose broadly on Wednesday and stood near a two-week high against its major peers, underpinned by a confluence of factors including elevated U.S. Treasury yields and a cautious turn in risk sentiment that weighed on Wall Street.翻译:受美国国债收益率上升以及令华尔街承压的风险情绪谨慎转向等因素共同支撑，美元周三普遍上涨，兑主要货币升至近两周高位。
item.author: Rae Wee

item.title: 台湾在主要空军基地附近的岛屿上空发现中国气球
item.description: Three Chinese balloons flew across Taiwan and near an air base, the Taiwanese defence ministry said. Taiwan is on high alert for Chinese activities, both military and political, ahead of Jan. 13 elections.翻译:台湾国防部表示，三个中国气球飞越台湾并靠近一个空军基地。在 1 月 13 日选举之前，台湾对中国的军事和政治活动保持高度警惕。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 由于家庭陷入困境，澳大利亚总理考虑额外缓解通胀
item.description: Australia Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Wednesday his centre-left government would consider new cost-of-living relief measures ahead of the May budget but without stoking inflation.翻译:澳大利亚总理安东尼·阿尔巴内斯周三表示，他的中左翼政府将在五月预算案发布之前考虑新的生活成本救济措施，但不会加剧通货膨胀。
item.author: Renju Jose

item.title: 亚洲 不要指望美国开赛能带来 2024 年的积极信号
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Alden Bentley

item.title: 巴克莱因需求担忧而降级后，苹果跌至七周低点
item.description: Apple on Tuesday fell nearly 3.6% to a seven-week low after Barclays downgraded the shares of the world's most valuable company on concerns that demand for its devices from the iPhone to the Mac will remain weak in 2024.翻译:由于担心 2024 年从 iPhone 到 Mac 等苹果设备的需求仍将疲软，巴克莱银行下调了这家全球市值最高公司的股价评级，周二苹果股价下跌近 3.6%，至七周低点。
item.author: Aditya Soni, Medha Singh

item.title: 2023年中国打破高温记录，酷热天气从北到南烘烤城市
item.description: The heat in China was relenting in 2023 with temperature records broken from Beijing to Shanghai, echoing the global heatwave phenomena that also engulfed most of the world and raised more concerns about global climate change.翻译:2023年，中国的炎热天气有所缓解，从北京到上海的气温记录都被打破，这与同样席卷世界大部分地区的全球热浪现象相呼应，引发了人们对全球气候变化的更多担忧。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 伦敦证券交易所数据显示，2023 年俄罗斯对欧洲的液化天然气出口量下降 1.9%
item.description: Russian exports of liquefied natural gas (LNG) to Europe fell 1.9% to 15.8 million metric tons in 2023, and LNG exports to Asia fell 11% to 14.9 million tons, LSEG data showed on Tuesday.翻译:LSEG 周二数据显示，2023 年俄罗斯对欧洲的液化天然气 (LNG) 出口量下降 1.9%，至 1580 万吨，对亚洲的液化天然气出口量下降 11%，至 1490 万吨。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 特斯拉第四季度汽车交付量创历史新高，但中国比亚迪抢夺电动汽车头把交椅
item.description: Tesla delivered a record number of electric vehicles in the fourth quarter, beating market estimates and meeting its 2023 target, but lost its spot as the top EV maker to China's BYD .翻译:特斯拉在第四季度交付了创纪录的电动汽车数量，超出了市场预期，并实现了 2023 年的目标，但将最大电动汽车制造商的位置让给了中国比亚迪。
item.author: Akash Sriram

item.title: 独家：电子游戏规则引发骚乱后中国撤职官员
item.description: China removed an official at a government body overseeing its press and publications regulator, five sources who were briefed on the matter said, days after Chinese gaming stocks were hit by proposed rules to curb spending on video games.翻译:五位了解此事的消息人士称，中国解除了负责新闻出版监管机构的一名官员的职务，几天前，中国游戏股受到拟议的限制视频游戏支出规则的打击。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 早盘买盘：2024 年伊始，标普 500 指数将创历史新高
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Samuel Indyk.翻译:塞缪尔·因迪克 (Samuel Indyk) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 2023 年全球工厂活动温和结束
item.description: Global factories had a weak finish to 2023, with euro zone activity contracting for an 18th straight month in December and Asia's manufacturing powerhouses taking a hit due to China's patchy economic recovery.翻译:到 2023 年，全球工厂表现疲软，欧元区 12 月活动连续第 18 个月萎缩，亚洲制造业强国因中国经济复苏不稳而受到打击。
item.author: Indradip Ghosh, Sam Holmes

item.title: 调查显示，2023年中国国有开发商将主导销售和土地市场
item.description: China's property market continued to consolidate in 2023 with state-affiliated firms dominating the home sales and land acquisition market, private surveys showed, as more private firms got embroiled in the sector's deepening debt crisis.翻译:私人调查显示，随着越来越多的私营企业卷入该行业不断加深的债务危机，2023年中国房地产市场继续整合，国有企业主导房屋销售和土地收购市场。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 荷兰取消部分中国出口许可证后，阿斯麦股价下跌
item.description: Computer chip equipment maker ASML said the Dutch government had partially revoked an export licence for the shipment of some of its machines to China, prompting a slide in shares and criticism from Beijing.翻译:计算机芯片设备制造商ASML表示，荷兰政府部分吊销了向中国运送部分机器的出口许可证，导致股价下跌，并招致北京方面的批评。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国元旦假期房屋销量较2023年下降26%
item.description: China's average daily home sales during the three-day New Year holiday in 40 cities, based on floor area, fell 26% compared with the same period last year, a survey showed on Tuesday.翻译:周二的一项调查显示，春节三天期间，中国40个城市的日均房屋销售面积（按建筑面积计算）与去年同期相比下降了26%。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 与中国关系的争议使台湾竞选活动恶化
item.description: Bitter disputes on how to handle relations with China and avoid conflict are dominating the final stretch of election campaigning in Taiwan, as some polls show a tight race between the main two contenders to be the island's next president.翻译:关于如何处理与中国的关系并避免冲突的激烈争论正在台湾竞选活动的最后阶段占据主导地位，因为一些民意调查显示，台湾下一任总统的两位主要竞争者之间的竞争十分激烈。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国呼吁台湾人民推动“和平统一”
item.description: The head of China's Taiwan Affairs Office on Tuesday called on Taiwan's people to promote the process of "peaceful reunification", saying it was the common desire of people on both sides of the Taiwan Strait.翻译:中国国台办负责人周二呼吁台湾人民推动“和平统一”进程，称这是两岸人民的共同愿望。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 12月份中国工厂活动增长加速 - 财新PMI
item.description: China's factory activity expanded at a quicker pace in December due to stronger gains in output and new orders, but business confidence for 2024 remained subdued, a private-sector survey showed on Tuesday.翻译:周二的一项私营部门调查显示，由于产出和新订单增长强劲，中国 12 月工厂活动扩张速度加快，但 2024 年商业信心依然低迷。
item.author: Reuters
